Source_Event_IDs.description: All original event IDs (e.g., 'allocation_code'). If only one source provides an ID, this array will have a single string.

Event_Type.description: An array of event types (e.g., 'emergency_type'). If multiple sources differ, all unique variations are retained.

Country.description: An array of country names (e.g., 'country'). If multiple sources differ, all unique names are retained.

Population_Affected.description: Number of people targeted or affected (e.g., 'number_of_people_targeted').

Source.description: List of sources or agencies (e.g., 'agency') that contributed to this record.

Comments.description: An array of project descriptions or other comments (e.g., 'project_description'). If multiple sources differ, all are retained.

AID_Contribution.description: Approved amount of financial aid contributed (e.g., 'approved_amount').

Approval_Date.description: Date when the funding or response was approved (e.g., 'approval_date').

Disbursement_Date.description: Date when the funding or response was disbursed (e.g., 'disbursement_date').
